item.title: How to get that nice picture next to your comment
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Daniel Semper Some weeks ago, I got a question from another blog how I got the picture next to my comment on their site. It is really easy, all you have to do is to sign up for free at gravatar, upload your photo, and it will appear next to your comments on a wide range of sites, including most blogs powered by Wordpress (like this is).
